type: Tutorial Step - Add a Timeline Chart

definition.text: Now that we have something to hold our charts, let's go ahead and add one!

paragraphs.text: Hover over your Time Machine and click Add Timeline Chart.

Giving a helpful name to a Timeline Chart is important. A good naming practice is to reference the Data Mine or Data Product with which it will be connected. Right now we will be adding Candles Data Mine data to this timeline chart. A helpful name would be:
Make sure your title is short! You'll see why soon.
